Reviews.Title: it sucks
Reviews.Author: newyorkjay
Reviews.Content: It ok but I don't like it it freezes to Much and the keyboard you have to push hard on the screen for it to work

Reviews.Title: lenovo tablet
Reviews.Author: zadairq81
Reviews.Content: I am pleased with this tablet. I was originally looking for a tablet to use for note taking during meetings at work but soon found out it could get pretty pricey! This is my first time using a tablet so I bought a cheaper version of the one I liked first. So far so good. Lenovo ideapad k1 is next on the list!
